title: Life begins
creator_credit: ERPI Classroom Films and Encyclopaedia Britannica Films
brief_description: Provides a condensation of the individual Child Development films, and gives an overall view of Dr. Arnold Gesell’s work at the Yale Clinic of Child Development. Includes an introductory and concluding address by Dr. Gesell. Stresses the need for infant hygiene and discussed the various phases of infant behaviour.
